programme.title: The Streets, Hong Kong
programme.desc: Over this eight-part series, renowned chef, Dan Hong will explore every corner of Hong Kong, learning about its history and culture and how this has shaped the local food scene. Determined to hunt down the most authentic fare, Dan will scour the streets, markets and hawker halls to meet the vendors and find out how these traditional dishes are made and served to hordes of hungry customers every day.

programme.title: FBI: Most Wanted S4
programme.desc: The Fugitive Task Force relentlessly tracks notorious criminals on the Bureau's Most Wanted list.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune S42
programme.desc: Ryan Seacrest takes over as the new host for the well-loved gameshow.

programme.title: Lingo USA S2
programme.desc: In this game show, hosted by the iconic RuPaul, the simplest of words could be worth thousands of dollars. Lingo is the fast paced word-play game that keeps on innovating for new audiences, with its mix of skill, tension, humour and the chance to win big cash prizes. Teams are pitted against each other in a battle to fill in the blanks and find words.

programme.title: Celebrity Catch Phrase S9
programme.desc: In this entertaining series packed with laughs, celebrity contestants attempt to work out catchphrases based on fun animations. Animations include well known phrases, sayings and even film, song and book titles. The celebrities need to buzz in as quickly as they can when they know the answer and can say what they see in a chance to win money for their chosen charities. - Shirley Ballas, Oti Mabuse and Jonathan Ross.

programme.title: Euromaxx
programme.desc: Everything you've ever wanted to know about Europe - from traditions and habits to culture shocks and record breakers.

programme.title: Donal Skehan: Home Cook
programme.desc: Master builder and household favourite Tommy Walsh, expert pro cleaner Maxine nspired by his sunny days living in Los Angeles, treasured family memories, and his love of good food, Donal brings a collection of his favourite fondest recipes, adapted using no-fuss techniques, designed with the home cook in mind.

programme.title: Jamie's Christmas Shortcuts
programme.desc: Jamie's Christmas Shortcuts gives us the gorgeous escapism of Christmas with quick and easy recipes that won't break the festive budget. In two episodes (The Big Day and Betwixmas), Jamie shares delicious ideas and shortcuts to create food that will be full of flavour while saving stress and time.

programme.title: Supa Strikas
programme.desc: (Dual language English and Malay) Follow Shakes, Rasta and the rest of the Supa Strikas on their quest to become the world's greatest football team!

programme.title: Henrietta
programme.desc: Henrietta, the cow, lives on a little farm together with the farmer and lots of other animals. Her life is full of big and small adventures, chaos, exciting journeys and sometimes even parties!

programme.title: Henrietta
programme.desc: Henrietta, the cow, lives on a little farm together with the farmer and lots of other animals. Her life is full of big and small adventures, chaos, exciting journeys and sometimes even parties!

programme.title: Gigantosaurus S2
programme.desc: Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu are four young dinosaurs growing up in the Cretaceous period. Life is always an adventure: new volcanoes are popping up all the time, long-necked brachiosauruses and enormous triceratopses roam free, meteor showers light up the night sky and... the fierce Gigantosaurus reigns over it all!

programme.title: Blippi 2
programme.desc: Blippi's enthusiastic and expressive character engages children on their level through relatable adventures while sharing their excitement in discovering the world around us. Blippi is so entertaining, engaging and fun, kids don't even realize they're learning!

programme.title: Blippi 2
programme.desc: Blippi's enthusiastic and expressive character engages children on their level through relatable adventures while sharing their excitement in discovering the world around us. Blippi is so entertaining, engaging and fun, kids don't even realize they're learning!

programme.title: Ollie & Friends S4
programme.desc: Sonic is having fun playing a pirate but takes the pretend-play too far when he takes things without asking for permission. It is up to Ollie and Page to teach him the proper way of asking before taking.

programme.title: Pinkfong Songs & Stories
programme.desc: Enjoy the best of Pinkfong's most loved songs and stories with all your favourite characters!

programme.title: Sesame Street S53
programme.desc: In this season, Ji-Young, a Korean-American girl muppet joins the main cast!

programme.title: Yakka Dee: Sr4
programme.desc: Return of the entertaining and inspiring series, with appealing animated character Dee revealing a whole new set of words. In each episode Dee sets off on a whirlwind word adventure. As she shows various visualisations of how the word's used, there are special surprises along the way - and everyone has a boogie when Dee's friend succeeds in saying the episode's featured word!

programme.desc: Return of the entertaining and inspiring series, with appealing animated character Dee revealing a whole new set of words. In each episode Dee sets off on a whirlwind word adventure. As she shows various visualisations of how the word's used, there are special surprises along the way - and everyone has a boogie when Dee's friend succeeds in saying the episode's featured word!

programme.title: Ollie And Friends S7
programme.desc: The Imp has no friends and feels lonely. When he sees Sloppy experimenting with some purple goo, he remembers how he was born and decides to make himself a friend from the very same purple goo that Sloppy used to make him. But in the process, he might have ended up creating a monster. Ollipolis has a new enemy: Stimp, the creature that the Imp created. But Stimp's nastiness is too much, even for the Imp. The Imp and the gang join forces to take down this new threat.

programme.title: Tangranimals
programme.desc: Young Geo explores Tangra-planet, an amazing place with geometrical landscapes, along with his friends the Tangranimals . These amusing creatures can link together like Tangram pieces, and thus create all sorts of vehicles, creatures and objects. With that power, plus a good measure of imagination, Geo and his friends are ready to meet any challenge!

programme.title: Gigantosaurus S2
programme.desc: Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu are four young dinosaurs growing up in the Cretaceous period. Life is always an adventure: new volcanoes are popping up all the time, long-necked brachiosauruses and enormous triceratopses roam free, meteor showers light up the night sky and... the fierce Gigantosaurus reigns over it all!

programme.title: Turbozaurs S1
programme.desc: The Turbozaurs are a dynamic team of friendly dinosaurs which can transform themselves instantly into amazing machines. They are discovered in the woods by three children, and together form a special rescue team!

programme.title: Turbozaurs S1
programme.desc: The Turbozaurs are a dynamic team of friendly dinosaurs which can transform themselves instantly into amazing machines. They are discovered in the woods by three children, and together form a special rescue team!

programme.title: Miniforce X [S2]
programme.desc: (Dual language English and Mandarin) The Miniforce fight against Villains threatening the Earth! Our heroes Volt, Max, Sammy and Lucy come back with upgraded X-power!

programme.title: Open Season: Call of Nature
programme.desc: When Boog and Elliot discover an abandoned Summer Camp in the middle of nowhere, they embark on a brave new adventure of creating a safe and special place to live that welcomes animals of every kind. Under the leadership of Boog and Elliot, the Campers must all work together to help create their own slice of paradise in the middle of the wilderness and to rediscover their inner wild.

programme.title: Open Season: Call of Nature
programme.desc: When Boog and Elliot discover an abandoned Summer Camp in the middle of nowhere, they embark on a brave new adventure of creating a safe and special place to live that welcomes animals of every kind. Under the leadership of Boog and Elliot, the Campers must all work together to help create their own slice of paradise in the middle of the wilderness and to rediscover their inner wild.

programme.title: PJ Masks S4
programme.desc: Instead of going to bed like all the other children, when our heroes get their pyjamas on, they magically transform into super heroes and become the PJ Masks!

programme.title: Pokemon Master Journeys: The Series (S24)
programme.desc: Join the continuing research fellowship adventures of Alola Champion Ash Ketchum and Goh, as they travel across all eight regions, including the new Galar region and Crown Tundra, based at Cerise Laboratory in Vermillion City in the Kanto region.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune S42
programme.desc: Ryan Seacrest takes over as the new host for the well-loved gameshow.

programme.title: Le Bisellahause
programme.desc: Phang, the company's numero uno agent is back and with exciting news she has managed to get Bisellahause in the running to become the exclusive property agency for a major upcoming condo launch but not everyone meaning Kenny is happy with the grand money-making scheme due to the potentially big risks involved. Kenny is suspicious of Phang's motives but Denis who aspires to be Singapore's Donald Trump doesn't want to listen.

programme.title: Kin
programme.desc: Debbie gets jealous of Ah Hock spending time with Emily, and lies to get his attention. Adina finally agrees to let Razali go for the job interview. Jessica meets with the snooty Orchid Ladies Society, hoping to garner their support for her charity venture.

programme.title: Jamie's Christmas Shortcuts
programme.desc: Jamie's Christmas Shortcuts gives us the gorgeous escapism of Christmas with quick and easy recipes that won't break the festive budget. In two episodes (The Big Day and Betwixmas), Jamie shares delicious ideas and shortcuts to create food that will be full of flavour while saving stress and time.

programme.title: Mark Moriarty – Cook Like A Chef - Series 1
programme.desc: In Cook Like a Chef, award-winning chef Mark Moriarty invites viewers to rethink the way they cook at home. Forget the notion that great food demands endless ingredients or hours in the kitchen. With a handful of core ingredients, a well-stocked pantry, and a few pro tips, Mark shows how anyone can create restaurant-worthy meals in their own kitchen.

programme.title: Celebrity Catch Phrase S10
programme.desc: In this entertaining series packed with laughs, celebrity contestants attempt to work out catchphrases based on fun animations. Animations include well known phrases, sayings and even film, song and book titles. The celebrities need to buzz in as quickly as they can when they know the answer and can say what they see in a chance to win money for their chosen charities.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune S42
programme.desc: Ryan Seacrest takes over as the new host for the well-loved gameshow.

programme.title: Don't Forget the Lyrics S7
programme.desc: Contestants must attempt to sing through and fill in the missing lyrics to TEN of the biggest hit songs of all time! But when the music stops, the contestant must correctly provide the missing song lyrics. If a contestant can successfully make it through the first 9 songs without missing a SINGLE lyric, they'll have the chance to play a 10th and final song for a shot at ONE MILLION DOLLARS!

programme.title: The Streets, Hong Kong
programme.desc: Over this eight-part series, renowned chef, Dan Hong will explore every corner of Hong Kong, learning about its history and culture and how this has shaped the local food scene. Determined to hunt down the most authentic fare, Dan will scour the streets, markets and hawker halls to meet the vendors and find out how these traditional dishes are made and served to hordes of hungry customers every day.

programme.title: News Tonight
programme.desc: (Live) The daily evening-news programme featuring highlights and coverage of both local and international news with a local perspective.

programme.title: 斗罗大陆之燃魂战
programme.desc: 全大陆高级魂师学院精英赛决赛结束，唐三跟小伙伴们恋恋不舍地分别，约定五年后重逢，便各自奔赴前程。而后，唐三随父亲唐昊去往隐秘山谷特训，提升自身能力。得益于唐昊的协助，唐三在积累经验的过程中变得更加沉稳，能从容应对更多挑战。戴沐白和朱竹清获得家族的肯定，分别成为星罗太子和准太子妃。奥斯卡和宁荣荣为提升实力开启艰苦训练，马红俊也外出游历以增长见识。就在此时，武魂殿的比比东暗中筹谋，横扫多个宗门，企图称霸斗罗大陆。于是，唐三召集伙伴创立唐门，坚守正义，勇挑重担。他们合力勇闯海神岛，与武魂殿对抗，不惧黑暗与强权，共同守护大陆和平，成长为坚毅的战士。.

programme.title: 食尚玩家 S13
programme.desc: 在"食尚玩家-热血48小时"里，主持人風田,谢雨芝与代班主持人杨奇煜帶領觀眾热血48小时！主持人想品嚐美食就得上山下海，就必须在時間內走完製作單位排的行程.

programme.title: 咖啡乌
programme.desc: 《咖啡乌》是一部具有浓厚新加坡特色的当代剧，围绕住在组屋区的中低收入家庭与小贩的生活展开，描绘了他们的喜怒哀乐与人生追求。.

programme.title: 咖啡乌
programme.desc: 《咖啡乌》是一部具有浓厚新加坡特色的当代剧，围绕住在组屋区的中低收入家庭与小贩的生活展开，描绘了他们的喜怒哀乐与人生追求。.

programme.title: 多情城市
programme.desc: 本剧以1960年代至1970年代的九份地区为背景，述说三个拜把兄弟如何赤手空拳打天下，藉由上一代的爱情故事串连与第二代之间共同的情感与记忆，深度探索两代之间的价值观差异。.

programme.title: 多情城市
programme.desc: 本剧以1960年代至1970年代的九份地区为背景，述说三个拜把兄弟如何赤手空拳打天下，藉由上一代的爱情故事串连与第二代之间共同的情感与记忆，深度探索两代之间的价值观差异。.

programme.title: 甜味。艺术
programme.desc: 甜点有疗愈心灵的作用，特别是卖相精致如艺术品般的甜品，不仅满足了人们的味蕾，也满足了人们在视觉上甚至是心灵上的享受。《甜味艺术》从艺术的角度看甜品，从甜点看一个国家一方水土的文化及审美。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻
programme.desc: 《晚间新闻》每日为您提供最全面的本地与全球新闻报道。.

programme.title: 医生不是神
programme.desc: 浩南带着彩銮和幼玉回家，志鹏帮忙哄幼玉，浩南则负责看彩銮吃药。彩銮明白儿子幸苦，答应乖乖吃药。志鹏也心疼浩南，决定辞了送餐员的工作，帮忙分担浩南的压力，留在家好好照顾幼玉两母女。亦格有感浩南蜡烛两头烧，却爱莫能助。.

programme.title: 没马跑 (中文版）
programme.desc: 马仲胃不舒服，到小宝工作的诊所做检查。马仲正在与大客户谈投资时，接到小宝来电，告之检查报告已经出来，医生要见他。小宝言辞闪烁，让马仲以为自己得了胃癌，晴天霹雳。万念俱灰的马仲得知小宝姐妹欠债 5 万，立刻转账给她。后来，马仲再从医生处得悉自己只是得了一般胃病，扬言要投诉小宝，小宝突然眼前一黑，晕倒。.

programme.title: 狮城热话
programme.desc: 周一至周五晚上7点，《狮城有约》谈话性栏目《狮城热话》以汇集多元声音及专家看法为目标，通过网络投票和引导观点碰撞，打造能让观众参与的时事舆论场。.

programme.title: 但愿人长久
programme.desc: 周台生去日本的时候遇到了邓丽君，两人相处得很自然。周台生回到美国，把邓丽君送段宁的礼物转交给她，丝毫没想起来今天是段宁的生日，段宁生气离家出走。.

programme.title: 甘味人生
programme.desc: 甘味人生，是一出阐述「一家人世代传承家业」的励志写实戏剧。剧中赵家是制作传统手工酱油的一个大家庭，家庭的父母兄弟姊妹，共同为这个家努力打拼的历程为主轴，描写刻画每个人在打拼的过程当中，与纠结在矛盾的感情世界里，所经历的悲欢喜乐。.

programme.title: 甘味人生
programme.desc: 甘味人生，是一出阐述「一家人世代传承家业」的励志写实戏剧。剧中赵家是制作传统手工酱油的一个大家庭，家庭的父母兄弟姊妹，共同为这个家努力打拼的历程为主轴，描写刻画每个人在打拼的过程当中，与纠结在矛盾的感情世界里，所经历的悲欢喜乐。.

programme.title: 一点新闻
programme.desc: (现场直播) 《一点新闻》为您提供更新的本地与全球新闻头条。.

programme.title: 开心速递
programme.desc: 故事围绕着洪氏和龙氏家族、他们的工作生活和朋友展开，在之前的剧集中，龙景峰的幽灵与洪氏家族成员结下了深厚的友谊。.

programme.title: 开心速递
programme.desc: 故事围绕着洪氏和龙氏家族、他们的工作生活和朋友展开，在之前的剧集中，龙景峰的幽灵与洪氏家族成员结下了深厚的友谊。.

programme.title: 开心速递
programme.desc: 故事围绕着洪氏和龙氏家族、他们的工作生活和朋友展开，在之前的剧集中，龙景峰的幽灵与洪氏家族成员结下了深厚的友谊。.

programme.title: 回归
programme.desc: 区耀祖和邓丽娟离婚后，各自在两地经营粤德居，多年来相安无事，直至香港特区回归廿五周年，丽娟决定回港开设分店，更为争夺粤德居品牌，不惜与耀祖对簿公堂。幼子家健参加大湾区创业比赛，遇上担任导师的兄长家谦。兄弟长期分隔两地，南辕北辙，难免磨擦，但血浓于水，加深彼此认识后，重建深厚亲情，携手研发出高科技虚拟技术，让父母重新经历廿五年来的起起跌跌，明白原来一直关心对方，二人冰释前嫌，一家四口终得以团聚.

programme.title: 回归
programme.desc: 区耀祖和邓丽娟离婚后，各自在两地经营粤德居，多年来相安无事，直至香港特区回归廿五周年，丽娟决定回港开设分店，更为争夺粤德居品牌，不惜与耀祖对簿公堂。幼子家健参加大湾区创业比赛，遇上担任导师的兄长家谦。兄弟长期分隔两地，南辕北辙，难免磨擦，但血浓于水，加深彼此认识后，重建深厚亲情，携手研发出高科技虚拟技术，让父母重新经历廿五年来的起起跌跌，明白原来一直关心对方，二人冰释前嫌，一家四口终得以团聚.

programme.title: 狮城有约
programme.desc: (现场直播) 总结一天大小事，关心属于你我的家园。每逢星期一至五，傍晚6.30-7.30pm，与你相约！.

programme.title: 但愿人长久
programme.desc: 段宁带着孩子来日本找邓丽君，邓丽君见到段宁很意外。周台生来日本找段宁母子，段宁觉得周台生心里依然没有她只有邓丽君，周台生终于向段宁表露了自己的心声.

programme.title: 饮茶
programme.desc: 最后一集以甜点作结才算圆满，除了传统中式糖水与糕点，融入西式元素也为茶客送上满满幸福感。怀旧甜点的做法不简单，玫瑰窝烧饼、糖沙翁买少见少；莲蓉西米焗布甸够香滑。萨奇玛、马蹄糕加入榄仁，口感有多特别？遮仔啫喱糖亦让盈盈重拾童年味道。芝麻糊、杏仁茶、红豆沙等经典糖水单吃、混搭皆宜，家英哥追求「黑白分明」，却要为盈盈特调「红杏出墙」？新派精致甜品显创意手艺，朱古力小笼包、龙须糖加开心果朱古力，滋味升华。.

programme.title: 星期二特写 ： 非凡的告白2
programme.desc: 《非凡的告白2》延续第一系列的叙事风格，以更深的视角走近一群身份特殊、经历独特的人物，听听他们叙述极具张力的人生告白。在本系列中，我们采访了太平间主管、法医、肌肉萎缩症患者、无国籍人士、私家侦探、职业保镖以及废品回收者。《非凡的告白2》让每一段人生，都能被看见、被理解、被尊重。.

programme.title: 没马跑 (中文版）
programme.desc: 渴望演戏的马赢接到前同事言导的邀请，要他参与一部电影的拍摄，还声称角色重要非他莫属，马赢被哄得雄心万丈，为了能专心拍戏，还跟家人谎称生病不能到贵妃汤店工作。却不知言导是为节省成本，只想利用马赢帮忙制作道具。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻
programme.desc: (现场直播) 《晚间新闻》每日为您提供最全面的本地与全球新闻报道。.

programme.title: 医点不夸张
programme.desc: 《医点不夸张》每集节目会邀请两位知名的专科医师，两位艺人、网红分享对抗病魔的经验。主持人还会用贴近生活的方式，让观众对健康问题更有感，一起长知识！.

programme.title: 全民星攻略
programme.desc: 随着孩子们离家上学或工作，许多父母们开始进入了空巢期。这个时期对于许多爸妈来说，是新的挑战，今天，我们将帮助您探索如何在这个特别的阶段找到新的生活乐趣——「空巢期」指得是「当子女离家求学或工作时」还是「步入更年期」父母可能会产生失落孤独等情绪？婚姻专家认为，「女性」还是「男性」的空巢期容易导致熟龄婚姻出现问题？男性在空巢期时，容易出现的情感压力主要来自「没有多花时间与孩子相处」还是「自我概念逐渐消失」？.

programme.title: 明日也晴朗
programme.desc: (双声道 - 中/韩) 荷妮母亲为了荷妮，到水晶精品店请求珍熙原谅，不惜在雨中下跪不起。.

programme.title: 明日也晴朗
programme.desc: (双声道 - 中/韩) 朴珍国误把珍熙当作水晶精品店店员，对着她数落水晶精品店代表一番。.

programme.title: 收场
programme.desc: 收场.

programme.title: 收场
programme.desc: 收场.

programme.title: 声生不息·家年华
programme.desc: 该节目由孙楠、古巨基、王心凌、谭维维、胡彦斌、郁可唯、汪苏泷、周深等12位歌手和毛阿敏、张淇等飞行嘉宾们共同唱响百年来中华大地广为流传的金曲，探寻百年中华音乐的足迹。.

programme.title: 第二任丈夫
programme.desc: (双声道 - 中/韩) 此剧讲述因无法停止的欲望酿成的悲剧，令一个女人无辜地失去家人，她在错综复杂的命运和爱情中展开复仇的故事。.

programme.title: 婚姻战争
programme.desc: (双声道 - 中/泰) 佳明上庭为晓玲作证。宝儿在开庭前告诉佳明她想复合并愿意相信佳明和晓玲没有关系。晓玲听了非常愤怒。.

programme.title: 明日也晴朗
programme.desc: (双声道 - 中/韩) 知道珍熙带狗狗小石出去散步却不慎弄丢了，文女士焦急得大骂无辜的女婿黄东锡。.

programme.title: 明日也晴朗
programme.desc: (双声道 - 中/韩) 东锡接到小石的消息，带着岳母找上珍国，没想到文女士却怪珍国没好好照顾小石。.

programme.title: 飞吧！ 玩客
programme.desc: 由人气主持人何美，搭配拥有超强综艺感的「四大男神」-谢佳见、陈谦文、杨奇煜及台日混血男星各务孝太领航，乘着亚洲航空四大航线，深入东南亚三大国家——马来西亚、泰国与菲律宾七大城市，带观众展开一场热情又神秘的冒险旅程，解锁不为人知的秘境与文化魅力！.

programme.title: 金秘书为何那样
programme.desc: (双声道 - 中/韩) 微笑发现自己当年应聘秘书的档案，英俊表示不选更优秀的应聘者，就因为她是微笑。.

programme.desc: End of Transmission.

programme.title: Ultraman Arc
programme.desc: The story is about Arc protecting the future of the Earth and mankind from looming threats. Yuma transforms into Ultraman Arc by inserting the Arc Cube, which contains the power of the being of light, into the mystic Arc Ariser and unleashing his power.

programme.title: Janji Sedap
programme.desc: Join our chef as he takes you to a culinary journey and learn how to whip up vibrant and flavoursome cuisine.

programme.title: Bukan Sekadar Lafaz 2
programme.desc: Aira, Khalid's cousin, returns home after being overseas working as a lawyer. Zaman, Syikin's father, gets released early from prison.

programme.title: Kerasnya Takdir
programme.desc: Munir and Jiha hold fast to their love despite objections from both their families. Aminah is disappointed with Munir's choice to live with Jiha whom she feels is inferior to them. Aminah expects Munir to inherit her company and marry Emilia. Munir and Jiha's lives are destroyed after Munir is involved in an accident while their son is kidnapped. JIha is accused of adultery. All this affects her mental state after losing Munir and their child.

programme.title: Bingit
programme.desc: Bingit is a drama series that highlights about mental illness. It aims to educate viewers about the different types of disorders, issues and causes that led to the disorder, symptoms and treatment.

programme.title: Hasrat Tersirat
programme.desc: It is a rare family gathering for the Hamzah's. But their joyous celebration did not last long. A phonecall comes in and distracts Hamzah. Amri is curious to find out who and what the caller wants. He becomes disorientated after witnessing a shocking incident which leads to an unexpected turn.

programme.title: Sayap Cinta Terindah
programme.desc: Dhani takes on the responsibility of caring for his younger siblings - Ariel, David and Isyana - navigating the challlenges of their intertwined lives. As their journey unfolds, each sibling harbors hidden secrets waiting to be uncovered. Will Dhani uncover the truths they're keeping from him?

programme.title: Sentuhan Harapan
programme.desc: With one third of the villagers born with disabilities, Karangpatihan in East Java is known as the idiot village for its high number of villagers with mental disabilities. Due to safety concerns, some of them are subjected to pasung - the act of caging and shackling the disabled.

programme.title: Boneka
programme.desc: A fiery clash between Bella and Nona dredges up a past that threatens Bella's marriage. As Nona's long-buried trauma erupts in front of everyone, Iryan and Gabriel face a new dilemma. That night, a covert meet and a mysterious call lead to a discovery that changes everything.

programme.title: Cinta Tiada Ganti
programme.desc: Riz chases Fatin out of the house when he discovers that she tried to spike his drink. Khairil finally tells Ara that Riz had no intention of marrying Fatin and that Riz still loves her.

programme.title: Ultraman Arc
programme.desc: The story is about Arc protecting the future of the Earth and mankind from looming threats. Yuma transforms into Ultraman Arc by inserting the Arc Cube, which contains the power of the being of light, into the mystic Arc Ariser and unleashing his power.

programme.title: Janji Sedap
programme.desc: Join our chef as he takes you to a culinary journey and learn how to whip up vibrant and flavoursome cuisine.

programme.title: Bukan Sekadar Lafaz 2
programme.desc: Hud forgives Syikin after she shares her fertility concerns to Dr Mikael despite Hud telling her not to. Hud and Syikin help take care of their goddaughter, Marissa.

programme.title: Berita
programme.desc: (Live) Catch the latest local and international news on Suria.

programme.title: Berani Lakon!
programme.desc: Have you ever seen Shazza or Omar Kenobi act on stage? What about Rarah Haermie and popular content creator, Sya? Don't underestimate Rico Setiabudi and Chef Muz either. Which 2 contestants will shine this week?

programme.title: Boneka
programme.desc: Helmi's accusation against Naura deepens the conflict, while Bella finally reveals her painful past to Iryan. At the same time, long-buried secrets about the tragic fire resurface, linking Deborah to a mysterious “black book” that holds the truth. But as revelations unfold, danger closes in on everyone living under Nona's roof.

programme.title: Operandi Gerhana
programme.desc: Singapore. 1955. Gangland crime threatens to swallow Singapore. After failing to contain the violence for years, the authorities are left with no choice but to jump into the fray- fighting fire with fire. In the wake of riots and rising organised crime with no one left unscathed, two Police Constables, Hazir and Fattah, are given a high priority assignment to investigate the kidnapping of one of their own senior officers.

programme.title: End of Transmission
programme.desc: End of Transmission.

programme.title: Uravai Thedi
programme.desc: Uravai Thedi which means 'searching for the kin' is a show that bridges the gap between individuals and families that were separated due to various reasons.

programme.title: Vaan Varu Vaan
programme.desc: VARU, a struggling writer who's trolled for her mediocre stories, is trying to write the greatest love story ever. But each time she tries to write, severe headaches, sleepiness and anything that will make her procrastinate will take over. Meanwhile VIKRAM enters her life. He has loved her from afar as a family friend for many years and now has entered into an arranged marriage alliance with her.

programme.title: Medai
programme.desc: A theatre play is an expression of many experiences and stories. And every culture in the world has its own methods and techniques of telling a story on stage. What if a theatre director could get to soak in a plethora of such experiences? How will they shape their theatrical creation? Two young Singaporean theatre directors set out to explore & understand the nuances of the theatre forms of India, and note down the ideas that take shape in their mind at every turn.

programme.title: Goli Soda: Rising
programme.desc: The Aachi Mess boys battle to reclaim their stolen van. As tensions over the mysterious bag escalate, the situation takes a darker turn with Pilot's sudden kidnapping.

programme.title: Rasikka Rusikka S6
programme.desc: Shabby and Prasad kicks off Season 6 and this time a round Rasikka Rusikka goes on a quest to explore budget cuisines.

programme.desc: Shabby and Prasad kicks off Season 6 and this time a round Rasikka Rusikka goes on a quest to explore budget cuisines.

programme.title: Race
programme.desc: Two stepbrothers own a huge stud farm and a horse racing business. When they learn that they have a common love interest, one of them tries to kill the other and inherit the insurance money.

programme.title: Savaal Singapore 3
programme.desc: This game show concept is an adaptation from the English version of We are Singaporeans . All questions and everything about the show will be about Singapore .There will be 6 celebrities in each episode and they will banter with the host and contestants and also ask the questions!

programme.title: Murai Maman (1995)
programme.desc: A fun-loving man is forced into a marriage alliance with his cousin, leading to comic clashes, love, and eventual acceptance.

programme.title: Super Samayal S3
programme.desc: Dare to be different when cooking your scallops! Watch how Chef Ariffin dares to be different in this episode of Super Samayal 3 with Jaynesh.

programme.title: Ethiroli S22
programme.desc: As 2025 draws to a close, Ethiroli chronicles important local milestones and events. Most were primarily centered around the General Elections, celebration of Singapore's 60th year of independence (SG60), significant progress in major infrastructure and policy developments.

programme.desc: (Live) Tamil Seithi focuses primarily on local and international news, information and current affairs. Catch the online news portal at http://seithi.mediacorp.sg/.

programme.title: Goli Soda: Rising
programme.desc: Naidu uncovers startling evidence hidden within the bag. Mayil approaches Ravi with a concealed motive. Meanwhile, Thillai visits Janaki to finally reveal the truth about her father's death.

programme.title: Pesuvom S4
programme.desc: Can lifestyle choices affect your liver? When exactly does liver cirrhosis occur? Dr Kalaiyarasi joins Karthikeyan, Shamini, Thavanesan, and Haleema to answer these key questions, share prevention tips, and make liver health simple and easy to understand.

programme.title: Aah!
programme.desc: Naren runs a charming little bistro with a spooky reputation. He jokes that it's the haunted atmosphere that attracts customers, but the real secret is his cook, Mother Devi. Her delicious dishes are what truly bring people in. However, Naren has a special talent---he can tell which of his diners are living and which are lingering spirits. Newly hired Priya, the ever-loyal waitress, gets spooked from time to time, but she stays because of her growing affection for Naren.

programme.title: Yaar 2
programme.desc: Mythili reconnects with her husband. Reeling from the excitement over the possibility of a marriage that is finally blissful, Mythili seeks Shalini out for advice. But Shalini is far from happy for her friend. What could be brewing?
